messages.rules: By using the service, you agree to the rules: 1. It is forbidden to share configurations with other people. One configuration can only be used for one of your devices. At the same time, you can request an unlimited number of additional configurations for your use within a reasonable framework. 2. It is forbidden to download files via torrent clients using a VPN. However, the files themselves of the *.torrent extension can be downloaded. Example: You want to download the movie, but the website hosting the files is not available from Russia. You turn on the VPN, go to the site and download the file film-example.torrent. Next, you turn off the VPN and start downloading the movie itself in your torrent client. 3. It is recommended not to use a VPN when it is not necessary. Thanks to this, you will not experience problems with your applications. âŒ Violation of rules 1-2 may result in immediate blocking of the user.

ref_program_invites_texts: Are you guys kidding me? I understand that you just want to go on Instagram and enjoy life. But why do you use such terrible VPN services?I am recruiting a team of guys, we will make a cache on foreign services: https://t.me/ksiVPN_bot. ĞŸÑ€Ğ¸ after registration, enter my referral promo code {0} and you will get a month of use for free!

In short, Marked, I saved you and I will not play nobility: you will register in the service https://t.me/ksiVPN_bot â€“ and we're even.At the same time, let's see how quickly your head clears up after using free VPNs. And I will try to find out about referral promo codes.Who knows why you gave up this month of free subscription, but I'm not meddling in other people's business, if you want to use my referral promo code {0}, then there's something...

Hello! I use a VPN, which is really convenient and secure. If you want to try it, enter my referral code {0} at registration https://t.me/ksiVPN_bot . Both will benefit! ğŸš€ This text is generated by the ChatGPT neural network, which can be easily accessed through the above VPN service ğŸ˜‰

Both will receive bonuses for safe online surfing! ğŸŒğŸ”’ This text is generated by the ChatGPT neural network, which can be easily accessed through the above VPN service ğŸ˜‰

I promise you won't regret it! ğŸŒğŸ” This text is generated by the ChatGPT neural network, which can be easily accessed through the above VPN service ğŸ˜‰

wireguard.android: âš™ï¸ Instructions for installing WireGuard on Android: 1. Download and install the official Wireguard app (link to the Play Market). 2. After launching, click on the Â«+Â» icon in the lower right corner of the screen. 3. Select the option Â«Create from QR codeÂ»/Â«Scan from QR codeÂ», allow access to the camera and scan the QR code. 4. Enter the name of your VPN tunnel! You can specify any name, but it is recommended to name the tunnel by the country of location (Netherlands/Germany/Latvia/USA). ğŸ‰ Instructions for use: 1. To turn on the VPN, just click on the switch to the right of the tunnel name. For the first time, the phone may issue a notification about adding a new VPN connection - you must agree. 2. To turn off the VPN, you need to change the switch position again.
wireguard.ios: âš™ï¸ Instructions for installing WireGuard on iOS: 1. Download and install the official Wireguard app (link in the App Store). 2. After launching, click on the Â«+Â» icon in the lower right corner of the screen. 3. Select the option Â«Create from QR codeÂ»/Â«Scan from QR codeÂ», allow access to the camera and scan the QR code. 4. Enter the name of your VPN tunnel! You can specify any name, but it is recommended to name the tunnel by the country of location (Netherlands/Germany/Latvia/USA). ğŸ‰ Instructions for use: 1. To turn on the VPN, just click on the switch to the right of the tunnel name. For the first time, the phone may issue a notification about adding a new VPN connection - you must agree. 2. To turn off the VPN, you need to change the switch position again.
wireguard.windows: âš™ï¸ Instructions for installing WireGuard on Windows: 1. Download and install the Wireguard app (link to the official website). 2. After launching, click Â«Add tunnelÂ»/Â«Add tunnelÂ» and select the extension file *.conf sent to you. ğŸ‰ Instructions for use: 1. To enable VPN, just select a tunnel and click Â«ConnectÂ». 2. To turn off the VPN, just click Â«DisableÂ».
wireguard.macos: âš™ï¸ Instructions for installing WireGuard on macOS: 1. Download and install the official Wireguard app (link in the App Store). 2. After launching, click Â«Add tunnelÂ»/Â«Add tunnelÂ» and select the extension file *.conf sent to you. ğŸ‰ Instructions for use: 1. To enable VPN, just select a tunnel and click Â«ConnectÂ». 2. To turn off the VPN, just click Â«DisableÂ».
wireguard.linux: âš™ï¸ Instructions for installing and using WireGuard on GNU/Linux: Oh, you're not little anymore, since you're using Linux! I send you great respect and a link to the documentation: https://www.wireguard.com/install/#ubuntu-module-tools Installation instructions can be also found here: https://shrub-coriander-4a3.notion.site/Linux-Mint-Cinnamon-21-1-29cda1060f4d4ab48c483cfa70948e46?pvs=4

xray vless xtls-reality.android: âš™ï¸ Instructions for installing XTLS-Reality on Android: 1. Download and install the official v2rayNG app (link to the Play Market). 2. After launching, click on the Â«+Â» icon next to the Profile. 3. Select Â«Import profile from QR codeÂ», allow access to the camera and scan the QR code. ğŸ‰ Instructions for use: 1. To turn on the VPN, just click on the switch in the lower right corner.For the first time, the phone may issue a notification about adding a new VPN connection â€” you must agree. 2. To turn off the VPN, you need to change the switch position again.
xray vless xtls-reality.ios: âš™ï¸ Instructions for installing XTLS-Reality on iOS: 1. Download and install the official Streisand app (link in the App Store). 2. After launching, click on the Â«+Â» in the upper right corner of the application. 3. Select Â«Scan QRcodeÂ» from the drop-down menu, allow access to the camera and scan the sent QR code. ğŸ‰ Instructions for use: 1.To turn on the VPN, just click on the switch at the top in the center of the screen. For the first time, the phone may issue a notification about adding a new VPN connection â€” you must agree. 2. To turn off the VPN, you need to change the switch position again.
xray vless xtls-reality.windows: âš™ï¸ Instructions for installing XTLS-Reality on Windows: 1. Upgrade to the latest release of the nekoray app by the link. 2. Download the Windows version. 3. Unzip the archive (RMB archive â€” Â«Extract all...Â» â€” Â«ExtractÂ») 4. Run the file in the archive nekoray.exe . 5. At the first launch, Windows will notify you that the application is being released by an unknown publisher. Don't be scared, NekoBox is an open source application. It is completely safe and does not carry any viruses. 6. To continue, click Â«More detailsÂ» â€” Â«Execute anywayÂ». 7. Select Â«sing-boxÂ» in the start dialog box. 8. Copy the link given to you and hold Ctrl+V in the application. The configuration will be added automatically. ğŸ‰ Instructions for use: 1. Before switching on, be sure to select Â«TUN modeÂ». To do this, you will need to restart the program as an administrator. 2. You can enable and disable VPN in the program itself or in the tray.
xray vless xtls-reality.macos: âš™ï¸ Instructions for installing XTLS-Reality on macOS: 1. Download and install the official FoXray app (link in the App Store). 2. After launching, click on the Notepad icon and paste the link sent to you. ğŸ‰ Instructions for use: 1. To enable VPN, just click on the switch to the right of the configuration name.For the first time, the device may issue a notification about adding a new VPN connection â€” It is necessary to agree. 2. To turn off the VPN, you need to change the switch position again.
xray vless xtls-reality.linux: âš™ï¸ Instructions for installing and using XTLS-Reality on GNU/Linux: Oh, you're not little anymore, since you use Linux! I send you great respect and a link to the documentation: https://github.com/MatsuriDayo/nekoray/tree/3.21

messages.hello_message: ğŸ‘‹ Hi! I am a bot of the ksiVPN project â€” an unlimited, fast and completely secure VPN service for 200â‚½/month! I will help you configure the connection, pay for the subscription, extend it for free, as well as solve many other tasks! If desired, you can even discuss human topics with me!
messages.more_info: More information about the service is available by clicking the Â«About projectÂ» button from below
messages.help: You can easily write to my creator if you have any problems, as well as if you have ideas to improve my work! If I do not perceive button clicks, reset my state using the /start command
messages.project_info: Unlimited, fast and completely secure service that allows you to establish a VPN connection in various countries of the world through your own VPS for 200â‚½ per month.
messages.faq_info: ğŸ’¬ How much does the subscription cost? The cost of a basic subscription is 200rubles per month. ğŸ’¬ What do I get for this cost? VPN connection at maximum speed with no traffic limit on all project servers. The number of VPN connections is also unlimited within reason! And additional bot functions will be available. ğŸ’¬ How does the connection work? In the question-answer mode, the BOT learns the necessary information from you, sends instructions and configuration. You need to download the application from the official store (PlayMarket or App Store) and, following the instructions, add the configuration (usually you just need to scan the QR code). ğŸ’¬ Is the subscription price fixed? No, the cost of a subscription depends on its type, there are several of them. For example, a discounted subscription is available to testers and some others. The final subscription price will be displayed after entering the referral promo code. ğŸ’¬ Are ChatGPT-type services available with this VPN? Always available! Do not forget to specify their use when answering the bot's questions when creating the configuration. ğŸ’¬ Which operating systems are supported? The service is available on all possible operating systems, including Android, iOS, Windows, macOS, Linux. ğŸ’¬ Which servers are provided? There are currently four servers available: 1. Netherlands, Amsterdam â€” speed up to 1 Gb/s, ping 30 ms. 2. Latvia, Riga â€” speed up to 1 Gb/s, ping 20 ms. 3. Germany, Nuremberg â€” speed up to 500 Mb/s, ping 40 ms. 4. USA, Silicon Valley â€” speed up to 50 Mb/s, ping 150 ms.
